definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: strength, might—Ex 32:18 + 16 t.; cstr. [[גְּבוּרַת]] Ps 147:10; sf. [[גְּבוּרָתוֹ]] + (sfs. 32 t.); pl. [[גְּבוּרוֹת]] Job 41:4 + 3 t.; [[גְּבֻרוֹת]] Psalm Ps 71:16; [[גְּבוּרׂתֶיךָ]] De 3:24 + (sfs. 6 t.);—
strength, of horse Job 39:19, Ps 147:10, crocodile Job 41:4, sun Ju Jdg 5:31, body of man Ps 90:10, Ec 9:16, Ec 10:17.

might, valour, of warriors Ju Jdg 8:21, Pr 8:14, Is 3:25, Is 28:6, Is 30:15, Je 9:22, Je 23:10, Je 49:35, Je 51:30, Ex 32:29, Ex 32:30, Mic 3:8, Mic 7:16; [[קוֹל עֲנוֹת גְּבוּרָה]], noise of shouting in warlike strength Ex 32:18 (E); [[עֵחָה]] [[וּגְבוּרָה]] 2Ki 18:20, Is 11:2, Is 36:5; cf. phrases of compiler of Kings [[כּׂל גְּבוּרָתוֹ]] 1Ki 15:23, 2Ki 10:34, 2Ki 20:20; [[אֲשֶׁר עָשָׂה וּגְבוּרָתוֹ]] 1Ki 6:5, 1Ki 6:27, 1Ki 22:46, 2Ki 13:8, 2Ki 13:12, 2Ki 14:15, 2Ki 14:28; cf. also [[מַלְכוּתוֹ וּגְּבּוּרָתוֹ]] 1Ch 29:30, [[תָקְפּוֹ וּגְבוּרָתוֹ]] Es 10:2.
